text.0: come gracious to our sacrifice o indra pressed somadrops are purified to please thee.
text.1: as cattle seek their home so thunderwielder come indra first of those who claim our worship.
text.2: with that wellformed most wideextending palate wherewith thou ever drinkest streams of sweetness.
text.3: drink thou the adhvaryu standeth up before thee let thy spoilwinning thunderbolt attend thee.
text.4: this drop steerstrong and omniform the soma hath been made ready for the bull for india.
text.5: drink this lord of the bays thou strong supporter this that is thine of old thy food for ever.
text.6: soma when pressed excels the unpressed soma better for one who knows to give him pleasure.
text.7: come to this sacrifice of ours o victor replenish all thy powers with this libation.
text.8: we call on thee o indra come thou hither sufficient be the soma for thy body.
text.9: rejoice thee Śatakratu in the juices guard us in wars guard us among our people.
